Use this checklist when defining and documenting a new role or persona for your project.

- [ ] _[Add more as needed]_

## Key Stakeholders
Identify the primary roles and personas this role interacts with:
- **Internal stakeholders:**  
  _[List internal teams or roles]_
- **External stakeholders:**  
  _[List customers, vendors, or external parties]_
- **Primary reporting relationship:**  
  _[To whom does this role report?]_

---

## RACI Matrix for Top 5 Activities
Define who is Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, and Informed for key activities:

| Activity | This Role | Product Owner | Project Manager | Technical Lead | Development Team | Stakeholders |
|----------|-----------|---------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| _[Activity 1]_ | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I |
| _[Activity 2]_ | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I |
| _[Activity 3]_ | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I |
| _[Activity 4]_ | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I |
| _[Activity 5]_ | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I | R/A/C/I |

**RACI Legend:**
- **R** = Responsible (does the work)
- **A** = Accountable (ultimately answerable)
- **C** = Consulted (provides input)
- **I** = Informed (kept updated)

---

## Onboarding Checklist
Tasks to complete when onboarding someone into this role:
- [ ] Introduction to team and key stakeholders
- [ ] Access to required tools and systems
- [ ] Review of role responsibilities and expectations
- [ ] Introduction to current projects and priorities
- [ ] Schedule recurring meetings and sync points
- [ ] Review relevant documentation and templates
- [ ] _[Add role-specific items]_

---

## Handoff Checklist
Items to complete when transitioning this role to someone new:
- [ ] Document current status of all active initiatives
- [ ] Transfer ownership of key artifacts and documentation
- [ ] Introduce successor to key stakeholders
- [ ] Review pending decisions and action items
- [ ] Share context on recurring meetings and ceremonies
- [ ] _[Add role-specific items]_

---

  - _[Metric 3]_
- **Qualitative outcomes:**

  - _[Outcome 3]_
